aboutMe.introductionText: My motivation comes from seeing the faces of my users light up with understanding or even happiness when they use my software. Whether it’s a user application or an API, usability is a key component of my designs, alongside a solid software architecture. Due to my independent and highly structured approach to work, I am able to complete my projects with high quality in the most pragmatic way.

projects.title: Projects
projects.subTitle: A selection of my most recent projects

skills.title: Skills
skills.subTitle: What to expect from my software and the process to develop it

descriptions.complexToEasy: No matter how complex the process, together we will find a way to display it in an easy way - and so keep the training effort to a minimum

descriptions.users: Users are integrated into the development process to find their actual problem
descriptions.leanUX: Lean UX: Changes after the actual release are kept to a minimum by using small, iterative Usability Tests throughout the development

descriptions.architecture: Later changes or new features are easily and low-costly implemented because of a thought-through architecture and component-based development

descriptions.years: With over 12years of programming experience(expertise) in various languages, you get the best from all worlds
descriptions.tests: Tests ensure that bugs are found by the developers, not the users

descriptions.scrum: An agile process perfectionized in the last 9+ years to ensure that all tasks for completing the project are written down, clear for everyone and developers can be put to work according on their skills

descriptions.liveIsShort: Live is too short to spend it in long meetings! Let me take care of the meetings and win more time for your actual work
descriptions.planning: By providing and following an agenda & preparing and collecting all points to be discussed throughout the development process, I keep meeting times to a minimum

texts.sapSaschaStephan: Frau T. hat uns als Developer und UX Designer in unserem Software Projekt über Jahre mit ihrem Fachwissen und ihren Fähigkeiten unterstützt.
